basics.name: Eugene Yamenko
basics.label: Technical Lead
basics.summary: Skilful in backend, frontend and cloud technologies. Possession of strong communication and mentoring skills. Experience designing and building complex large scale data driven systems. Knowledge of best practices across the full software development life cycle.

highlights: Led a backend team responsible for listing related services.
Reduced an average response time by 23% for a listing retrieval service by avoiding the file system buffering for large response objects.
Created a technology strategy for the team along with an audit of the existing solutions.
Reduced cached data size by 72% by storing data in a compressed binary serialisation format leading to an improved network latency, lower bandwidth usage and more cached data.
Increased performance by 48% for an on-demand imaging service by modernising it and switching to an image engine optimised for the used processor architecture.
Built an API backend and worker services for the off-market properties product.
Reduced service operational costs by 60% by modernising and containerising 18 services; and utilising a scalable container management platform.
Built a frontend application to manage listings in migration between listing providers.
Introduced and adopted infrastructure as code tools; and created a library for deploying load balanced, worker and scheduled services.
Built a frontend application to manage related development projects.
Split the company’s main monolithic application into smaller maintainable applications.
Was a part of the architectural group, which advised on the software design and architecture.
Built a service to send out and track promotional and recommendation emails.
Implemented a custom integration with Salesforce.
Built a frontend application for end users to store and manage uploaded videos.
Organised and regularly presented at the monthly internal knowledge sharing events.
